description: Retrieves the protection status of tasks in an Amazon ECS service.

parameters.name: cluster
parameters.description: The short name or full Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the cluster that hosts the service that the task sets exist in.

parameters.name: tasks
parameters.description: A list of up to 100 task IDs or full ARN entries. (string) ---

nested_items.name: protectedTasks
nested_items.description: A list of tasks with the following information.
protectionEnabled: The protection status of the task. If scale-in protection is turned on for a task, the value is true. Otherwise, it is false.
expirationDate: The epoch time when protection for the task will expire.

nested_items.name: failures
nested_items.description: Any failures associated with the call.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the failed resource.
